title: First State National Historical Park: 2016 Centennial Bioblitz
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar     2016 Centennial Bioblitz               Centennial BioBlitz 2016       Join First State National Historical Park and The Nature Conservancy in Delaware in a nationwide BioBlitz. Engage in scientific exploration of the unique biological and cultural resources in this newly established park. The bioblitz will take place in the Beaver Valley tract of open fields and forests located on the Brandywine River less than two miles north of the Wilmington city limits.   Event is rain or shine!    Can't make the event? Join us on Periscope @NortheastNPS as we take you along with us for some of the field inventories!   Â            What is a BioBlitz?   An inventory of plants and animals.        Event Details   When and where, and how to get there!              Public Participation Day - May 21, 2016   Discover nature in your backyard!        Maps and Directions   Find out more!
